job_purpose: Lead a small team of engineers to architect, build, and maintain cloud-based microservices and Angular web UI’s for CRiS Care web applications.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead a small team of engineers
Architect, build, and maintain cloud-based microservices
Develop Angular web UI’s for CRiS Care web applications
Report to CRiS Care’s board of Directors
Collaborate in a small team in a dynamic environment
required_qualifications: At least 5 years of full-time software development experience
Experience in designing and implementing distributed systems
At least 12 months experience with Kotlin or Java
preferred_qualifications: Experience in Spring Boot, REST, GraphQL APIs
Experience in DevOps tools (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, AWS)
Familiarity with Artificial Intelligence tools and services
Previous experience in the healthcare domain
Experience with Angular or other SPA frameworks
company_details: CRiS Care is an Australian company servicing the healthcare industry with cloud-based patient care capabilities, managing tests, facilitating clinical assessments, and providing a platform for seamless clinical care across facilities.
